title: Mayacama Selects Elite Alliance®
text:
Elite Alliance
DALLAS , Aug. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Elite Alliance ® , the leader in exchange services for prestigious residence clubs and luxury, professionally managed vacation homes, announced Mayacama as the newest addition to its growing portfolio of vacation destinations. Nestled in the hills of northern Sonoma County, California , not far from the charming town of Healdsburg , Mayacama is a private golf and residence club, positioned on 675 acres of classic California Wine Country. The Jack Nicklaus signature course is consistently ranked among Golf Digest's "Top 100 Courses in America". Mayacama's residence owners will now enjoy exchange and membership privileges in Elite Alliance's expanding network of world-class resorts and professionally managed vacation homes.
" Mayacama is a very special place, offering incredible golf, hospitality and lifestyle experiences in California Wine Country," said Elite Alliance President Rob Goodyear .
The secluded members-only sanctuary boasts one of America's grand golf courses, hidden hiking trails, swim and tennis centers, and a stunning 40,000-square-foot clubhouse complete with a European spa, gourmet dining and a 3,000-square-foot wine cellar. The extensive year-round offering of social, sporting, culinary and wine programs further enriches the Mayacama experience.
Inspired by the intimate hillside villages of Tuscany , Mayacama Residences is an imaginative mingling of nature, art and design. Quintessentially alfresco; it is elegant, yet casual, with equal attention given to outside and inside living. Mayacama's 2,700 square foot, three-bedroom Villas and 840 square foot, one-bedroom Casitas cascade down the terraced hillside, carefully arranged to capture the most beautiful views.
" We selected a luxury exchange program that fit the quality of Mayacama. Our members are excited to vacation with Elite Alliance, in the style they are accustomed to," said Johnathan Wilhelm , Managing Partner.
About Mayacama
Founded in 2001, Mayacama is the first private club to open in Sonoma County in 60 years. It combines the luxuries of a wine country retreat with a world-class private golf course in the heart of the Sonoma foothills. Surrounded by the Mayacamas mountain range, vineyards and graceful oak trees, the Club's 675-acre Jack Nicklaus-designed golf course pays tribute to the traditions of the game. A sweeping Mediterranean-style Clubhouse, which was completed in 2003, offers Members the very best in dining and wine experiences. Other amenities include an exclusive Vintner Members wine program, full-service spa, kids' camps & juniors program, and well-appointed ladies' and men's locker rooms and lounges. August 2007 brought the launch of a unique ownership opportunity in the heart of wine country with its Residence Club, a collection of Casitas & Villas. For more information, please visit: www.mayacama.com
About Elite Alliance ®
Elite Alliance ® is the leader in exchange services for prestigious residence clubs and luxury, professionally managed vacation homes. The simple exchange process transforms real estate ownership into a key that unlocks the door to seamless travel adventures - ski trips, golf getaways, beach escapes and much more - at a growing array of coveted destinations worldwide. Properties in the Elite Alliance portfolio meet premium standards of quality, service, location and amenities. Elite Alliance members experience the luxury, convenience and personal attention they have come to expect, whenever and wherever they go on an Elite Alliance vacation.
For more information, please contact Rob Goodyear at rgoodyear@elitealliance.com or visit our website: www.elitealliance.com .
